column1: kes- is a Quenya word meaning "to search (for something)
column2: to examine (something) in order to find (something)".
column3: p. 156 It has been suggested that the regularized spelling would be ces- according to the Quenya of The Lord of the Rings.Petri Tikka
column4: "http://www.petritikka.com/elvish/PE17.html Quenya words in Parma Eldalambaron 17" at http://www.petritikka.com/elvish/ Men Eldalambínen (accessed 9 January 2010)
